name: Swedish House of Finance National Research Data Center
description: Web-based platform providing access to a wide range of financial databases for the academic community, including Fama French Factors, FinBas time series data, historical archives, NASDAQ HFT data, Nordic Compass ESG data, PAtLink patent & trademark data, Serrano financial data, and Morningstar fund performance data.
owner_name: Stockholm School of Economics / Swedish House of Finance
